author: FawcettJohnW
body: I tried to install using your doc and got stopped at the git clone.  Paul helped me figure out that the username should have been my access token, and he helped me get one set up.  Please update the docs with information about generating and saving access tokens.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Please refer to the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) linked in the readme. We purposefully do not duplicate this information in all five building documents.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'd be happy to have more links in those documents under the Git setup section, which currently focuses on that flavor's specific requirements, but could certainly re-reference the main contributing document.

title: Linux install docs need to talk about access tokens
